name: sms-sender-twilio
description: Send SMS/MMS messages, retrieve message details, list messages, get account info, and look up phone numbers via Twilio API. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: sms_sender_twilio
toolDefinition.description: Send SMS/MMS messages, retrieve message details, list messages, get Twilio account info, and look up phone numbers. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: send_sms (send an SMS), get_message (get message details by SID), list_messages (list messages with optional filters), send_mms (send MMS with media), get_account (get Twilio account info), check_number (look up phone number info)

to.description: Destination phone number in E.164 format (e.g. +15551234567). Required for send_sms and send_mms, optional filter for list_messages.

from.description: Sender phone number in E.164 format (e.g. +15559876543). Required for send_sms and send_mms, optional filter for list_messages.

body.description: Message body text (max 1600 characters). Required for send_sms, optional for send_mms.

messageSid.description: Twilio message SID (starts with SM or MM, 34 characters). Required for get_message.

limit.description: Number of results to return for list_messages (1-100, default 25).

mediaUrl.description: HTTP(S) URL of the media to attach. Required for send_mms.

number.description: Phone number in E.164 format for lookup. Required for check_number.
